subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3731, how did it go?
description_text:
I haven't received the second part of delivery yet. Only baseplate. Do you
have a tracking number or any other information?

On Tue, Dec 23, 2025 at 20:18 SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

> Hello Dmitrijs, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only
> takes a few

conversations.body_text: So haven't yet received: 1) Simsonn HB Pro Racing Simulator Handbrake 2) Quick Release(QR)

Hi sumeks,    We apologize, but these products are currently out of stock in our German warehouse and cannot be shipped to Latvia. We will process a refund for you. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.   Happy New Year!
Is there no option to wait for restock?
Hi sumeks,    I will check the recent restocking schedule for you and get back to you.

Hi sumeks,    Sorry for the delayed response. We can now ship to you from China again, but the shipping costs are quite high. We can only send you the handbrake and refund the quick release. Is that acceptable?
Hi, ok. Agree for handbrake delivery and quick release refund.
Hi sumeks,    Alright, we've arranged for your shipment and refunded the quick release.
